content:
Maybe some of the @number_theorists would like a break from fixing splitting fields and have a look at this PR? @Kevin Buzzard ?
The file it extends depends on quadratic reciprocity, which is still some 30-40 (depending on where you look) files away from being ported and currently held up by the splitting field business, as far as I can see from the Zulip discussions. The main purpose of this addition is to deal with the "TODO" in that file, i.e., provide a proof of the characterization of natural numbers that are a sum of two squares.
